item.title: Bannana Bread
item.description: Ingredients 3 1/2 cups of sifted all purpose flour 3 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 1 tsp baking soda 2 cups of mashed ripe bananas 2 tsp of lemon juice 3/4 cups of shortening 1 1/2 cup of sugar 3 eggs 3/4 cups of milk 1/2 chopped walnuts or pecans Directions Sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda, combine bananas and lemon juice. Mix well. Cream together shortening and sugar in a bowl with electric mixer medium speed until fluffy.
